metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17671 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In WordPress before 5.2.4, unauthenticated viewing of certain content is possible because the static query property is mishandled.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-17671` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 5.2.4+dfsg1-1
wordpress-l10n - 5.2.4+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentynineteen - 5.2.4+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwenty - 5.2.4+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentyone - 5.2.4+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.2.4+dfsg1-1').
